meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that oestrones are hormones found in the body.
meanings.sent2: She learned in biology class that oestrones play a crucial role in the reproductive system.
meanings.sent3: The oestrones in the lab were having a party, celebrating their important functions.
meanings.sent4: The abundance of oestrones in her bloodstream was compared to a bustling city full of activity.
meanings.sent5: The image of oestrones working together was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: Oestrones: third person singular present of oestrone
meanings.sent1: He always oestrones about his achievements to anyone who will listen.
meanings.sent2: The cat oestrones around the house, claiming its territory.
meanings.sent3: The car oestrones down the road, showing off its new paint job.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts oestrones like a river flowing endlessly, never staying in one place.
meanings.sent5: The wind oestrones through the trees, whispering secrets to the leaves.
